ComicInfo.Characters: Fathom,Fist] (cameo),Talisman],Ragna and Ramman, (Diviner’s and Challenger’s twin sons),The Elementals [Vortex,Monolith,Justice Machine [Challenger,Trinika and the twins Andron and Cala (Titan‘s family, all die in this story),Prosecutor Zarren,Crusader,Maxinor,Demon,Blazer,Monolith] (flashback cameo),Manslaughter,Tasmia Fynn (Blazer’s mother), the new Justice Machine [Id,Night Lightning,Diviner,Titan,Morningstar,Mr. Dulachan (an underworld crime leader),Youthquake [Robert Maxinor],Phaser
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:01:04 [Issue ID 4000-131072] urn:comicvine:4000-131072 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 15:47:40. [Issue ID 247571]
ComicInfo.Summary: Choosing Sides: The Justice Machine disbelieves the Council branding them as rebels and -- with Maxinor’s help-- journey back to Georwell to clear their names and contact their families. Alas, the damage is done. Titan’s family dies while protecting him from Council soldiers, Diviner’s sons try to shoot her when she approaches them, and Blazer’s mom tells her daughter everything will be all right. Breaking into encrypted Council files, Challenger finds that Maxinor has been right all along. The six regroup after 12 hours of being on the run only to be confronted by their replacements.
ComicInfo.Title: Choosing Sides
